diseases.name: Eczema
diseases.symptoms: Red, itchy, and inflamed skin patches.
diseases.remedy: Use moisturizers and avoid harsh soaps.

diseases.name: Psoriasis
diseases.symptoms: Silvery scales and red patches on the skin.
diseases.remedy: Consult a dermatologist for topical steroids.

diseases.name: Acne
diseases.remedy: Keep skin clean and use salicylic acid products.
